question: Which state Government is to constitute State Folk Art Council?
explanation: With an objective to protect, conserve and promote the rich and distinguished culture and tradition of Chhattisgarh, the State Government has decided to constitute State Folk Art Council.The State Folk Art Council will compile literatures related to various folk arts in Chhattisgarh and publish the same. It would also list the folk art groups functioning in State and carry out their registration apart from providing them necessary equipment, musical equipment and other necessary materials to these folk groups.
